Have Pepper Farm Deli Cater Your Next Event

San Diego's Favorite Deli. Since 2020, we've been purveyors of delicious food at affordable prices. We pride ourselves on using only the freshest ingredients and crafting great sandwiches! Check out our Catering Menu!

Reviews

Paul Stanley
★★★★★

Pepper Farm Deli has some of best deli food I have tasted in a while. They have a unique blend of sauces and fresh food that was very delicious. Highly recommended.

Lora
★★★★★

I haven’t had one thing that wasn’t delicious, fresh and beautiful! All sandwiches, salads, soups and sides have been amazing! And you have to get the cheesecake!! Amazing service as well! Great people!

Dan
★★★★★

Fresh, fresh, fresh. You can taste the freshness. Presentation of food is above a “deli” style shop. Very clean, tables and floor, and everyone working. This is my new deli shop!!! It starts at the mouth watering menu and ends with the last tantiliz8ng bite.. The proportions are above and beyond what you’d find in a traditional deli. I had the “Pounder”, which was served on a hoagie, and it was quite filling. It was well worth the price you pay, which isn’t to terribly over the top considering restaraunt prices. Try this place and you’ll see what I’m talking about and i highly doubt you will be disappointed!!! And if you are, there is something wrong with you. This is definately a 5 star shop. The people, the food, the cleanliness, all 5 star. Thank you P.F. deli for a wonderful experience. Can’t wait to come back for a different sandwich, and try a smoothie.

VISIT US

Pepper Farm Deli

Pepper Farm Deli was established in 2020 with the purpose of making some of the best food in Santee. We wanted to be more than just a sandwich shop. Many hours were spent creating a menu that is sure to make you want to keep coming back for more. It’s proven to be the tastiest food in Santee, California.
